ISSUE.TITLE: Unsupported variable query operation: EQUALS
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: flowable-rest.war 6.4.0 POST /query/historic-process-instances when the parameters like : { "variables": [ { "name": "applyUserId", "operation": "EQUALS", "value": {}, "type": "string", "variableOperation": "EQUALS" } ] } the respose is : { "message": "Bad request", "exception": "Unsupported variable query operation: EQUALS" }

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: flowable-engine: Fix "org.apache.maven.surefire.booter.SurefireBooterForkException: There was an error in the forked process [ERROR] GC overhead limit exceeded" on Travis when using Java 8 by increasing max heap for tests on Java 8. (#1448)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix Swagger/OpenAPI "query for historic process instances" description Fixes "Unsupported variable query operation: EQUALS" (fixes #1437)
